lead_paragraph: A.C. Milan forward Ronaldo ruptured a tendon in his left knee in a 1-1 tie with Livorno on Wednesday and was carried off the field in tears. The injury occurred two minutes after Ronaldo entered the game during a play that earned Milan an equalizing penalty kick. Ronaldo was taken to a hospital, and the club said the full extent of the damage was unknown. He has played sparingly since joining Milan from Real Madrid in January 2007. Wednesday’s match was only his fifth in Serie A this season.
